TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit NSDictionaryExtensions extends System.Object

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool ToPoint (this Foundation.NSDictionary dictionary, out CoreGraphics.CGPoint point);
.method public static hidebysig bool ToPoint(class Foundation.NSDictionary dictionary, valuetype CoreGraphics.CGPoint point) cil managed

Docs.summary: Turns the contents of an NSDictionary into an PointF.
Docs.returns: True if the NSDictionary contained a single point element, false otherwise.
Docs.remarks: Use this method to turn an NSDictionary that was previously created from a PointF using the ToDictionary extension method back into a point.
